summary: This document contains various Schedule K-1 forms related to the partnership MIDWAY-CAROLINAS 2012 LLC for the tax year 2012. It details the income, deductions, and credits allocated to the partner BLUE CHIP CAPITAL, LLC, including specific amounts for ordinary business income, rental income, and other financial items. The document is significant for understanding the financial relationships and tax obligations of the involved parties.
